Please note that this will add the attac: Please note that this will add the attachment page URLs to the sitemap, not direct image URLs.
Include the Featured Image too, even if: Include the Featured Image too, even if it does not appear directly in the post content.
Enter post IDs of posts you want to excl: Enter post IDs of posts you want to exclude from the sitemap, separated by commas. This option **applies** to all post types including posts, pages, and custom post types.
Add term IDs, separated by comma. This o: Add term IDs, separated by a comma. This option is applied for all taxonomies.
Include this post type in the XML sitema: Include this post type in the XML sitemap.
Insert custom field (post meta) names wh: Insert custom field (post meta) names which contain image URLs to include them in the sitemaps. Add one per line.
Include archive pages for terms of this: Include archive pages for terms of this taxonomy in the XML sitemap.
Include archive pages of terms that have: Include archive pages of terms that have no posts associated.
Add user IDs, separated by commas, to ex: Add user IDs, separated by commas, to exclude them from the sitemap.
Max number of links on each sitemap page: Maximum number of links on each sitemap page.
Include reference to images from the pos: Include the reference to images from the post content in sitemaps. This helps search engines index the important images on your pages.
This tab contains General settings relat: This tab contains general settings related to the XML sitemaps.
